Title: ASP.NET TimePicker Control
Description:
An AJAX enabled ASP.NET time picker control that resembles the windows time that is displayed in the taskbar of XP. Behaves much the same way.
Works well in conjunction with a datepicker control for appointment settings.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An AJAX enabled ASP.NET time picker control that resembles the windows time that is displayed in the taskbar of XP. Behaves much the same way.
Works well in conjunction with a datepicker control for appointment settings.

See Demo's and Documentation here: http://www.MichaelKBell.com/TimePicker
